easyToUse.title: Easy To Use

blockchainBased.title: Blockchain Based
blockchainBased.description: Secure and decentralized blockchain trades with our own strategy

telegramIntegration.title: Telegram Integration
telegramIntegration.description: That provides you with flawless functionality in the innovative Telegram messenger

steps.title: Step 3
steps.description: Select a coin and the amount you want to invest

steps.title: Step 6
steps.description: Confirm the action in the wallet

panel2.title: How do the payments work?
panel2.content: You can withdraw your funds upon the completion of the investment term through the 'History' section by clicking the 'Withdraw' button.

panel3.title: What happens to the money?
panel3.content: Your investments are diversified across portfolios through smart contracts. Fund returns are automatically processed upon the expiration of the investment period.

panel4.title: How can I contact support?
panel4.content: Customer support is available 24/7 via the Telegram chat here.
